casebody.data:
Bessie C. Pfeiffer, as Administratrix, etc., Respondent, v. The American Surety Company, Impleaded, etc., Appellant. Decided June 28,1889. Appeal by defendant from judgment entered on verdict of jury. Stickney & Shepard, for appellant. F. F. Nugent and William H. Arnoux, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., and Freedman, J.

Per Curiam.

Judgment affirmed with costs.
